Matthjis will be on the same pay scale as De Jong i.e. less than €10M gross per season. Barça has received information that Raiola will do what the player tells him despite his desire for Matthjis to play somewhere else before joining Barça. [@ffpolo]


A vital meeting is scheduled after the game against Lyon between Bartomeu, Jordi Mestre, Pep Segura, Abidal and Ramon Planes. A meeting where decisions for the future will be made. Potential targets like De Ligt and Luka Jovic will be on the table. [@MigRico]
